Protectorate
As a team, we will conquer!
I shall protect us!
Discipline and strength!
Invicta!
Work together!
Stand close together, we'll be protected!
Let me catch my breath!
I shall drink from the mysterious liquid!
Humanitarian
Together as a team!
My medical training will aid us!
I can keep us alive!
I will tend your wounds!
A Doctor can help!
I am a Rescuer!
Laughing gas will help!
Just relax a bit!
I know I can do it!
Now pay attention!
This will enhance you!
You will benefit!!
I need to protect the group!
Hounds, get ready for action!
We won't die so easily
We'll fight to the end!
Together a team!

The Rescuer wears a thick winter coat made of Pyrenean wool. The coat has been passed down through generations of Rescuers. As a symbolic gesture to the healing arts, the coat is continually repaired and restored, never replaced. His crook is made of a single straight and elastic tree branch which serves as an extension of his arm. If the Rescuer finds himself cornered, he can use his weapon to push enemies away.

Growing up in the Monks of St. Bernard Hospice, the Rescuer had a privileged education. The Monks taught him how to recognize the healing properties of plants and minerals, and secrets of the shepherd. Later, in university, he sharpened his medical knowledge with the latest discoveries in pharmacology, where he learned how to synthesize laughing gas, and administer it safely. For his reputation and expertise he was granted the title 'Médecin-Chef'.

Trained in herbal and traditional medicine, the Rescuer can turn plants into powerful healing medicine. His knowledge of shepherding helps him maintain the body and spirits of his four-legged companions. At camp, he can focus on studying, looking for Herbs, or teaching combat techniques. When needed, the Rescuer will sacrifice sleep and stamina to ensure the recovery of his party. The Hounds, who help him survive in the wild, can serve as watch guards or help energize the team.
Rejoice for the Rescuer ...

With the arrival of spring, the snow melts, and the alpine pass clears. A sturdy man accompanied by two friendly dogs descends from the mountain with three villagers thought to be dead! The Hamlet celebrates!

There will be too many pups!
The pack will become too unruly!
Sorry, that isn't going work!
He's the worst! I'm a much better doctor! No, thank you.
Sorry, that Priestess makes the dogs uncomfortable.
Her energy seems dark. I won't travel with that Priestess.
We won't travel with her!
Those hounds hate me!
We are not a good match!

This has a kick!
Ready for Action!
Cheers!
To the fallen!
To Honor!!
For the team!
This is the best Brandy!
This brandy was used to keep Rescuers warm!
The monks started profiting from brandy production.
This may enhance our attack!
This has a kick!
Ready for action!
This will enhance my aim!
Top shelf brandy! Thanks
It warms my belly!
Don't mind if I do!
To victory!!
Cheers!
To the hounds!
One drink can't hurt!
I feel strong!
Now that's an excellent Brandy!
This enhances my power!
Better than medicine!
Not exactly wine...
To the future!
*cough* That. Is. So. Strong!
It soothes my pain!
Let's start the party!
Even better than ale!
To the hunt!
A drink worthy of the sea!
Advanced Medical Training
{colour_start|resc_blue}Careful study and dedication have enhanced your healing skills.{colour_end}

I now undertand what the Monks meant.
My staff training has advanced.
A new way to handle the crook will be helpful.
Agility and speed can overcome brute strength.
If I land it correctly, the subject may be stunned.
Presure to Suceed
{colour_start|resc_blue}You allow the pressure of success to hinder your mood.{colour_end}

Identify the lead.
Stay close now!
It will be easier to control the enemy.
If we stay organized we can stay in charge.

The Hounds know where to strike for more blood!
The dogs have evolved their hunting tactics!
The Mountains taught the dogs how to hunt!
Scent is keen for a good hunt!
There's nowhere left to run!

Search for {colour_start|notable}Supplies{colour_end}
The dogs are restless; they sense danger surrounding us.
The hounds seem agitated by something in the air
I remember that time on the mountain ...
You have to stay healthly to perform well in dangerous situations.
Time to practice. Just the basics before going to sleep
A little sparring practice?
Weapsons are important to maintain.
Military training dictates ...
Let me tend to your injuries.
This can relieve soreness.
This technique will make you feel better.
Place this poultice directly on the inflamed muscle.
Try to rest, I'll stay awake to monitor the treatments.
Rest tonight. The hounds will stand guard.
You'll feel better in the morning ...
This could be the last rest in a bit, make good use of it.
Physiology is the study of body parts as a whole.
Biochemistry is the study of living structure chemicals.
Anatomy is the study of the relationship between body parts.
I’m falling behind reading the latest medical studies!
Stay on your toes.
They dogs will keep us alert.
The hounds are nervous!
You need to be quick to stay up with the hounds!
The hounds will alert us to any danger.
We have experienced finding lost people.
Strong scents may grant us insight into what lies ahead.
They like to explore on their own sometimes!
This filthy soup will kill us!
Don't let her boil the hounds!
Hurry! The hounds will drown!
The hounds are now loyal to the mistress!
I will use my knowledge to aid the Queen.
We do not care about the party anymore.
It was merely a form of mind control. Forgive me!
The hounds and I were bewitched!
It was like a nightmare, I could not wake up!
Unleash us at once!
The dogs don’t like being leashed!
Chains will terrify the hounds!
I used to be a military doctor.
My purpose is to heal and help
All my years of training will bring us good results
My medical training can't cheat death.
Good night... friends
Take care of the dogs... please
Recurring phenomena will elicit apprehension!
I should have stayed in bed!
My vital signs weren't good today
Even my own body betrays me
I knew this team didn't want me here
I can't trust anybody, not even myself
Death... a gift...
Death was my only companion in my work
I can finally live what I've been preventing all my life
It takes years to learn the craft of healing!
You all made me fail!
My death will follow you all... if you survive...
I don't about healing others anymore!
I've wasted my life helping others.
If I die who's going to take care of you all?
Life is short, the healing craft so long to learn.
Patients are mostly idiots!
Death was unbeatable... after all
My patients are stealing from me!
Gurutz, Alina... take care of the team...
Gurutz, Alina... give me my medicine...
Will the brigands find me?
Everything is turning white... just endless snowy hills
We are black dots in a snowfield
Are the brigands still following me?
Gurutz cover your steps or they will find us
Alina you're making too much noise, shut up!
Most of my patients are drunk, high or obnoxious.
We can open all the gas canisters and drift away
Let's see how much I can endure this pain
Don't be so weak. I was trained in the military.
Why should I heal you?
In all my years in the army, I never saw such a pathetic team
My medicine is not enough for all of us
I need to protect the hounds first.
A Healer must heal himself first.
I could not save the patients or the nurses!
So many perished in the avalanche!
Everyone who helps other dies...
Thunder reminds me of the avalanche!
Those Rams have been chasing us for years.
Maybe I should have become a Dentist?
I am patient. I will learn your story.
I will learn from this experience!
We are writing today, the science of tomorrow
A healthly body and a strong spirit!
Science will guide us!
We will face the avalanche and prevail!
I am trained in the healing arts!
Science overcomes anything!
My mind is clear, and my memory shines!
I can hold life in the balance!
I can feel the medicine running through my veins!
I feel like when I graduated!
Sickness can be cured!
I am cured, I am alive, I am ready!
My body feels healthier than ever!
I am in tune with my body!
The human body is the best laboratory in existence
For the first time, my body is in perfect condition!
My medical knowledge will save us!
My training as a doctor is invaluable!
I can patch us up!
Science will aid you!
With the right stimulus, the body can make incredible feats!
I can enhance your virtues!
I am inquisitive
The heart and the mind work together!
Our team is a living organism
I am powerful like a Saint Bernard!
All my training has brought me here
My medicine can cure anything!
I am shackled to my medical training.
I risk getting diseases by helpful others.
I am afraid I won't be able to help everyone.
Science has let me down.
You're going to try to get rid of the hounds!
This is making me nervous.
This isn't working for us.
Love is not a medicine
Do you think all my training was for nothing?
You don't know how to apply first aid!
I am Physician, treat me accordingly.
You should treat me with respect.
As a Healer, I am due honor and respect.
I cannot defeat Death.
Death is the enermy, and he has superior forces.
It is tiring to always wage war against death.
I don't understand why we are here!
Let's go. Let's run. We need to leave now!
I must leave this field of battle.
The Ram is chasing us, I must hide.
The avalanche is too depressing to relive.
They are coming for me, the brigands, from the mountain hospital!
Don't hurt the hounds!
Hounds! No! Don't move back.
I dare you to hit the hounds! You'll regret it.
We are near a breaking point.
I don't think the hounds will stay much longer.
Let me get a closer look at them.
I need to get closer, Gurutz is getting blind with age
If only I were a cat person!
I should've gotten a cat.
My mother warned me, I wouldn’t find love.
Is this the position you want, Alina?
Take me, my time has come.
I'll never have another puppy hound.
If I'm going to die, at least I'll see what will kill me
This team is heartbreakingly stupid!
If I'm going to die, at least I won't be the first one
The Doctor should go first!
I need to be here to take care of you all
Get out of my way, the Hounds need a walk.
You all should be my shields! what other purpose do you have?
Death is the natural order of things!
It's too much. I've seen too much.
I can't do it, it's too dangerous
The nurses, wil they haunt me, did their spirits forgive me?
It would be like walking in the way of an avalanche
Don't Doctors deserve the best food, the best beds, the best of everything?
Don't count on the three of helping for a long time!
I guess I'm by myself...
All my education and I still can't cure most ailments.
I guess all my experience is not enough in this situation
I can kill you as easily as curing you.
Are you sure about this, Gurutz?
My surgical knives are envied by others.
I'll have to figure it out by myself
Everybody look! Pain is revealing... enlightening...
Sometimes, pain is inevitable!
Check my reflexes!
Be the practice mate of my hounds
The dogs are fed up with the constant orders!
Just like when you're alone in the snow...
I have to make sure that my blood won't be spilled in the snow
Blood and bones, blood and bones.
I fear my mind needs treatment too
Stiches will not last forever.
That Ram will find us and destory us!
Emergency medicine has been a waste of time.
I'm afraid I'm running out of medicine
Did you hear that?! we're being followed
We're leaving steps in the snow, they will find us!
If you were to open to the experience of pain, i wouldn't have to be here
Pain can be your ally if you let it
The medical profession has a grudge against the human race!
You would all be dead if it wasn't for me
You know, my companions need a place near the fire too
The three of us will be leaving soon. You're just too much trouble!
I bet my companions habe been more useful than you in this mission
I miss the long days of the north. And the sky …
I saved so many lives from the freezing snow, but who will save ME?
Gurutz are you the one stealing the medicine from my backpack?
Alina, be a good dog and bring some truffles to accompany our meals
Take me, but do not harm my party!
Pay attention to me, bring me the pain that will open my eyes
You might as well take me, I don't think I can carry on anymore …
We're already doomed, I want thisto finish!
Over here! Do you see me!
Gurutz, Alina, let's play fetch!
You wish to take away my dogs!
Stop that Gurutz!
You're making my job more difficult than it should be
You're stupidity is not helping anybody!
Ali, get down!
The two of you are acting up. Stop it.
I need to clearmy mind... with pain
Get off of me, no treat for you!!
If only I could have saved everyone at the field hospital!
Get down! You're scratching me.
I have to get your claws trimmed.
Hey. Calm down girls!
There's a rat inside my coat!
We can't leave now!
They will find us and kill us if we don't get rid of them
They will come back and bite our behinds if we don't deal with them now!
I must avenge their deaths, I'm not leaving!
I could not save them all!
Are we gonna run? we will he be hunted down like rabbits...
We can't leave, their agression has answers that I need!
The answers that we need are running through our veins
Wait! Gurutz wants to keep fighting!
Wait, Alina doesn't want to give up yet!
Now that I think about it, they are not our enemies!
I am afraid to lose more people in my life.
Pay attention!
Hounds no! Stop it!
What was that?! Who's there?!
Gurutz, why are you biting me?
Aline, stop! you're hurting me...
I had a vision of Pet Cemetery …
Look what you're making me do!
I want more!
Why did you leave the mountain?
What am I doing down here, I don't belong here.
We must stop the pain.
I'm seeing things, I need cognitive readjusting!
I saw a Nightmare … in a dream … a strange beast.
I dreamed that beast found us again.
I am not as strong as the Rescuer who saved me
I'm afraid I'm a burden to this team
I'm becoming old... and slow...
They've been following me since the summit.
The pass of the mountain is where they will wait for us!
My vision is getting blurry because of the snow shinning
I must get back to the mountain, the wind, the snow …
It's too warm here in the south.
I miss the great north.
The blizzard blurs my vision
The wind doesn't let me aim properly
It was made of snow! I'm seeing things!
Nothing to be proud of...
Are you going to defend us with that?
My dogs hit harder than that...
By the gods, you are a fool!
A puppy can hit harder than you!
You smell like the dogs!
You have to hit harder to break the ice
Lance the boil.
Set the bone!
This is over, we'll be crushed!
We'll be buried in unmarked tombs...
Are you failing on purpose?!
Seems to me that you want THEM to live, and want US to die
Look what you're doing! we can't waste our opportunities!
Are you blind? it seems that youre missing on purpose!
You better listen to me next time!
We need to work as a team!
I'm afraid that won't be enough...
You need to pay attention
Do you have a beast chasing you? Like we do.
You're interfering in our pain exchange...
Do you feel the blood pumping in your veins?
Stop petting the dogs!
You don't think I'm a good Doctor do you?
Treat the hounds with some respect.
Weak! weak as a newborn puppy!
A swing and a miss!
Is religion stronger than science?
Is medical science less powerful than magic?
I'm afraid I won't be able to help if we switch positions...
What is so special about this particular spot?
Why do you want this position? are you hiding something?
You can't take me away from this pain
This pain want me to stay here!
Let me show you a bad bedside manner!
You know, this is MY spot!
What are you gonna do here? good for nothing...
There is so much we don't undertand about medicine.
I know diseases but I don’t know people.
I am a Doctor, but I am a fraud.
Just a minute, let me understand this pain
I don't need that.
I don't want that, thanks anyway.
It would be a waste of useful resources...
Save that for the others please.
I don’t agree that would be helpful.
We need to save supplies for the attack.
No, I can't give you the secret recipe of my brandy
Are you trying to buy my hat with that?
No!, this is like the avalanche...
Red snow, snow mixed with blood
There's blood everywhere, I can't handle this!
It's hard to watch another pass from this world.
The Monks would be saddened by my behavior.
I can't remember all their faces.
If you trip on me, you'll become dog food!
Do you want to use me as shield to cover your escape?
Are you trying to obstruct my job?
Come for me instead!
There will be no pain after death.
I need to step here.
I don’t know more about death than you do!
None of you appreciate me!
You'll be useless no matter what spot you are in
It is coming for us!
Hey, stop playing around hounds.
I wont be able to save you all.
Pay attention dogs, please.
I need a just a moment.
Give me a minute.
How will this aid us?
This could be end of us!
Let me take a look and see.
This may be something my hounds can eat.
I deserve a treat too!
What about us? what's our part?
Will provide understanding of my own pain
Pain is pain, it doesn't matter where it comes from
The blade cuts, the needle stings, the hammer smashes, but this pain has no name
Gurutz look, this is what I was talking about
Alina, do you want to see what's that thing?
Alina, Gurutz, you both have to learn about this
Pain was waiting for me
Life keeps secrets from everybody, pain is one of them
Where else can I experience something like this?
Just like avalanche... too quick to escape
Let me take a look.
The hounds blundered into that one!
The Hounds smell something here.
Stop! Hounds! It's a trap!
I'll step into this for the group!
I remember the sound of the avalanche!
I need to attend to this myself.
I don't think that will work.
To heal pain, one must know it
Pain is my matter of study
Pain keeps my mind sharp
Don't throw pearls to the pigs...
What's the point in your efforts? we're all doomed already...
Your intentions are good... but pointless
Alina doesn't want you to heal me
But I am the doctor, I should be the one healing you
Alina, Gurutz, stop it, we need medical attention
What does that do? do you want to get me killed, don't you?
I don't trust your methods, they don't seem scientific
Do you really think this will help, or you're using me as test subject?
Don't interfere with my pain!
Don't try to numb my senses, I need this pain!
You're just like snow, you numb my body to block the pain
There's no possible improvement... there's no point in trying
You're just running in circles... just following your own tail
we're dogs barking at the darkness of the night
What are you trying to do to my dog?
The hounds don't seem to like it, and I trust them
You're scaring my dogs, stop it!
Gurutz, help me hold my position!
Alina, hold me!
My head is spinning!

You'll pay for that smite!
A curse that you will regret!
My medicine is stronger than evil.
Another wholesale slaughter!
Stop him! You must stop him.
Take a look at these books, maybe you can learn too

Do you feel better now?
Now you are ready to fight again!
Stand up, you'll be fine
Realize that victory lies in calculating one's steps
Battle is chaos, if you bring order, you already won
Your bigger advantage is perseverance, not strength
Even doctors can't escape …
I am in the waiting room of Death's office!
I feel the cold... It's like being buried in snow!
I can't, it might alert the monsters!
Noooo, put the fire off, is going to betray our position
I can't die here and leave the dogs alone
I know you all want my medicines, but you won't have them
Oh! you want to kidnap my dogs?!
I know what's happening. You think I can't fight?
Pain opens your eyes, it's a form of knowledge
Focus on the pain.
Give me a break. You are terrible at that.
I could get better care from a first week Nun.
I've have a better chance on my own.
I'd prefer to take care of it the right way. Thank you anyway.
I don't think so.
It's not worth it in the end.
That is NOT how it was done at the hospital
I remember Sally!
Fred did not deserve to die.
Did you see a large ram? He is following me.
I know you don't really want me and hounds here.
I don’t want to be cured.
I need to feel it to know I am alive.
Don't go to the Sanitarium. They will lock you up. You're crazy!
Afraid of a little needle?
In the end people give up, they don't fight to live.
It won't help.
I only belive in science.
Did you see that? Was is a large Ram?

Are you using me as a human Guinea pig?
Do you want to poison me so I have to use my medicines?
What you eat can affect your body.
People underestimate the importance of nutrition!
I can't cure anything truly.
Give my share to the hounds, I cannot eat.
I'm not hungry for that, thanks anyway.
These camp meals lack proper nutrition.
There's no use, the Ram will find us soon.
Isn't there anything we could hunt?
Something is following us!
I am a Rescuer! I aid those in need!
My hounds are loyal companions!
I will assist luckless travelers!
Science triumphs again!
Teamwork will lead to victory!
